name: A Pirate's Reward
description:
In “A Pirate’s Reward” you are a pirate with a bounty on your head. Try to sink the other ships before they can sink you! But there’s one problem: the more ships you sink, the higher your bounty becomes.

Controls :

  • WASD or ←↓↑→ to move around
  • Mouse to rotate your view
  • Escape for pause menu
  • Space-bar or left mouse button to shoot

Team:

Marco Schneider: Programming, User-Interface
